content_descriptors.notes: "Night Stroll" contains sexual behavior, nudity, and exhibitionism and is not appropriate for all ages. The characters in the story are all over the age of 20.

name: Night Stroll Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows10
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: An ordinary girl named "Suzuki Rika" who can be found anywhere. It all started with an adult magazine, and the exhibitionism play began. From not wearing skirts to walking around completely naked, experiencing the pleasure of shame through exhibitionism.
supported_languages:
Japanese*, English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support
